publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7638 Pauline McNeill: BBC Albaâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by the BBC Trust that BBC Alba will be made available on Freeview in Scotland; congratulates BBC Alba on being found to be performing well and achieving its aims, and believes that this will further promote Gaelic language and culture.
S3M-7638 BBC Alba (lodged on 21 December 2010) Jamie Hepburn*
